entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
